QuestData.Title: Helboar, the Other White Meat
QuestData.Description: Those eggs are superb, but what do you say we kick it up another notch?$B$BA side of bacon would round out the meal perfectly and I know just where to get it.$B$BThis place is littered with helboars. Of course, there's no one here to inspect and tenderize the meat, but we're in luck!$B$B<Legassi rummages around in his pack and produces a flask.>$B$BThis wasn't made for use on pork, but cooking is as much about improvisation as anything else!
QuestData.LogDescription: Legassi at the Zeppelin Crash wants you to gather 8 Purified Helboar Meat. To purify the meat, use the Purification Mixture on the Tainted Helboar Meat you gather from Helboars.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you successful in purifying the helboar meat?
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm...$B$BThis looks edible, if spiced properly. Just don't tell Screed where his breakfast came from, ok?
